meaningMnemonic: You put a <radical>lid</radical> on a dish you're cooking, made up of the <radical>mouth</radical>s and <radical>forehead</radical>s of a <radical>pig</radical>. This is truly an <kanji>exceptional</kanji> dish you are cooking up.
readingMnemonic: <kanji>Exceptional</kanji> pig mouth forehead soup is a favorite of Grandpa <reading>ごう</reading>いち. You see him sniffing around your window, then he knocks and waves.
